items.content_html: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
items.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

items.content_html: fetchQuery is a lightweight and flexible JavaScript library that simplifies making HTTP requests with support for both synchronous and asynchronous operations. Inspired by the popular axios library, fetchQuery provides an easy-to-use API for GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests.
items.title: DaimDN/fetchquery: fetchQuery is a lightweight and flexible JavaScript library that simplifies making HTTP requests with support for both synchronous and asynchronous operations. Inspired by the popular axios library, fetchQuery provides an easy-to-use API for GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests.

items.content_html: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.
items.title: antharuu/klaim: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.

items.content_html: A real-time chat application built using HTML, CSS, Socket.io, Node.js, and Express.js. This app allows users to send and receive messages instantly, leveraging WebSocket technology for seamless communication. Simple, lightweight, and perfect for learning real-time web communication.
items.title: aeldab3/chat-app: A real-time chat application built using HTML, CSS, Socket.io, Node.js, and Express.js. This app allows users to send and receive messages instantly, leveraging WebSocket technology for seamless communication. Simple, lightweight, and perfect for learning real-time web communication.
